title: Same fonts like Guardian Egyptian Headline (but not Stag)
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140721195801im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_6447.png)
  
Hello to all,  
I am doing a font research for a possible headline font and then Guardian Egyptian is my final choice. But it is a bit expensive. I would like to find alternatives

but also with the same small As and Gs and also have a variety of weights.
author: Ian Raphael Lopez

comments.content:
It's worth buying the real thing.

hhp
I already received a surprise allowance from my aunt and I am planning to buy the Guardian family.
